originalText.text: “ We had an exceptional experience with Dr. Singh and Dr. Perez during my IV hydration treatment. They were not only informative but also made us feel incredibly comfortable throughout the entire process. The placement of the IV line was virtually painless. They frequently checked on our well-being, ensuring we were okay. Moreover, the IV drip room had a fantastic city view, adding to the overall positive experience. We highly recommend their services and the beautiful atmosphere they provide.”

originalText.text:
Dr. Singh is a fantastic doctor who made sure I understood everything about my pain. She went into great detail and explained what I can do to feel better. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking help with their pain.
I went to her office in Forest Hills

text.text:
Dr. Singh is a fantastic doctor who made sure I understood everything about my pain. She went into great detail and explained what I can do to feel better. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking help with their pain.
I went to her office in Forest Hills

originalText.text: Dr. Singh is wonderful. Not only is she a highly skilled and knowledgeable physician, she has exceptional bedside manners. She is honest, competent, and really cares about serving her patients well. She will never push for procedures which are not medically necessary and has a wholistic view on healing. There is no better choice than Dr. Singh.

text.text: Dr. Singh is wonderful. Not only is she a highly skilled and knowledgeable physician, she has exceptional bedside manners. She is honest, competent, and really cares about serving her patients well. She will never push for procedures which are not medically necessary and has a wholistic view on healing. There is no better choice than Dr. Singh.

originalText.text: Dr. Singh is a marvelous doctor. She takes the time to get to know you as a person and her patient. She explains everything thoroughly and clearly. She engages you in your healthcare as every doctor should. She is very professional and has wonderful bedside manner, as well as also being friendly, patient and kind. She really listens to you when you speak to her and addresses any questions or concerns you may have. You never feel rushed during an appointment with her and that makes you feel like a human being and not just a number to be rushed out the door and forgotten one you walk out. I have had nothing but positive experiences during each appointment with Dr, Singh of which I have had many since I see her once a month. I wish every doctor were as informative and engaging in my own healthcare with me. She never talks down to you or assumes you just won’t understand like sadly I have had the unpleasant experience of way too many doctors doing. She is truly a gem of a doctor and I highly recommend her to anyone who needs pain management treatment!

originalText.text: The absolute best doctor for pain management. Dr. Singh was one of the few doctors that heard me and my concerns and looked for solutions. Very kind, caring and patient. You can see the compassion she has for her patients, I am forever grateful. Thank you Dr. Singh!!
